thread.title: Jenni Dobbs
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Jenni Dobbs

author: Jenni Dobbs
title: Jenni Dobbs
text: I purchased the BBG Workout 1.0 and 2.0 with the HELP Diet Guide on the 80% off discount day which meant I got it all for $39.97 - absolute bargain. It arrived straight away, is really well written and easy to use and well worth the money. I'm also looking forward to being a part of Kalya's wider network of BBGers and getting the support that that will offer!
